alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 11:18PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central St. Louis County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Burntside Lake, to near Cotton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Burntside Lake and Robinson around 1120 PM CDT. Ely around 1125 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Aurora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis
